title: Help ID modern serif
content:
I hope someone can ID this font. I would be very gratefull. I only have these 2 numbers and 3 letters. I thought it was one from Gerard Unger, it looks so Dutch, so crisp, but I can't find it. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105075643im_/http:/typophile.com/files/35_5458.jpg)
author: elzosmid

comments.content: Sorry, found it 'Constantia'. How do I remove this post?

The closest I have is [Constantia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105075643/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/constantia/) but I really doubt that could be the one...

EDIT: really late... I don't think it is possible to delete any post (at least for a user)

Are you taken aback that it's not Dutch?

hhp
